All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Activity
superclass for both courses and events provides core functionality for both subclasses
ArrayList<E>
a custom ArrayList class
ArrayQueue<E>
Queue implementation using ArrayLists
ArrayStack<E>
A stack based on ArrayList.
ArrayStackTest
Tests ArrayStack.
Conflict
the conflict class defines when an activity has a schedule conflict with another
ConflictException
the custom exception ConflictException is thrown when an activity has a conflict with another activity in the schedule
Course
Creates the Course object and checks that all fields are valid.
CourseCatalog
covers catalog functionality from WolfScheduler
CourseCatalogPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the CourseCatalog.
CourseCatalogTest
Tests the WolfScheduler class.
CourseNameValidator
CourseNameValidator class uses the FSM which uses the state pattern to check for valid course names.
CourseNameValidatorFSM
Finite State Machine for checking whether a Course's Name is valid.
CourseRecordIO
Reads Course records from text files.
CourseRecordIOTest
Tests CouresRecordIO.
CourseRoll
CourseRoll represents the students enrolled in a course.
CourseTest
Tests the Course class.
Faculty
The Faculty class represents an individual faculty record.
FacultyDirectory
Maintains a directory of all faculty
FacultyDirectoryPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the FacultyDirectory.
FacultyRecordIO
Manages reading and writing Faculty records to and from a file
InvalidTransitionException
Custom exception for invalid transition between states
InvalidTransitionExceptionTest
test the InvalidTransitionException class ensures it presents the correct error message
LinkedAbstractList<E>
a custom implementation of LinkedList that extends the AbstractList class
LinkedList<E>
A custom, double linked list that uses an iterator to improve efficiency.
LinkedListTest
Tests the custom LinkedList class.
LinkedQueue<E>
Queue implementation using Linked Lists
LinkedStack<E>
an implementation of the stack data structure using an ArrayList
LinkedStackTest
Tests ArrayStack.
PackSchedulerGUI
Main GUI for the PackScheduler project.
Queue<E>
Queue interface
RegistrationManager
The RegistrationManager handles course catalogs, student directories, and user credentials to control access to features within the system.
RegistrationManagerTest
tests the implementation of the RegistrationManager class
Schedule
the class the defines a schedule object to be used in the Student class
Stack<E>
An interface for creating stacks, that can be backed with LinkedLists or ArrayLists.
Student
student class is a class for the student
StudentDirectory
Maintains a directory of all students enrolled at NC State.
StudentDirectoryPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the StudentDirectory.
StudentDirectoryTest
Tests StudentDirectory.
StudentRecordIO
Handles input and output of student records (writes and reads to/from files, etc.)
StudentRegistrationPanel
Creates a user interface for students to register for classes.
StudentTest
testing class for the Student class
User
Represents a general User in the PackScheduler system, including fields for first name, last name, ID, email, and password.
